name: Long Key Beach Resort & Motel

reviews.text: My husband & I wanted a short (5 day) break before I retired & did not feel the high prices of other hotels we've stayed at in the area were justified. We chose Long Key Motel based on trip advisor reviews & it proved to be even better than expected.
reviews.title: Couldn't Have Chosen Better

reviews.text: Yes, it is an older motel & the closets are (1) in the water heater encloser and (2) in the bathroom. On the other hand, it was extremely spacious & immaculate & the staff couldn't have been friendlier or more helpful. We rented room 114, bayfront, for
reviews.title: Great Place!

reviews.text: $122 but there are less expensive rooms. It was roomier than the jr. suite we had rented previously at Tradewinds. This was not just an efficiency - it had a full, separate kitchen.
reviews.title: Gleefully Great Escape

reviews.text: Most of the other guests at the time we stayed were European & all were very friendly. We only rented a car for 2 days as the trolley service is very good, but one of the other guests actually offered to give us a ride to a restaurant we had mentioned.
reviews.title: Strange Place!

reviews.text: The wi-fi connection in the office is great & no charge for printing!
reviews.title: Clean and inviting...yet somewhat strange.

likes.liked: — That it was a small resort and very clean.
likes.disliked: — The wi-fi internet connection was hit or miss; length of walk to water on the beach

aka: Long Key Beach Resort And Motel
